amendment.description: Amendment requires that any international agreement needs to be written in plain writing as a condition to enter into the agreement.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 114-846 to add an additional requirement that the international agreement must be written in plain writing, as defined by the Plain Writing Act of 2010.
